captions.text:
Here we go again now Michigan Police Department
that has taken action against a guy who's

57-years-old by the name Floyd Dent who appears
to have done almost nothing wrong he had been

working for Ford for 37 years in the state
of Michigan no criminal record no nothing

OK what did he do he the grave crime of going
past a stop sign when the cops light you know

sirens on and he got a little you know dazed
by that he didn't for long he just ran a little

bit of a stop sign and then pulled over he
didn't speed up he wasn't trying to get away

and by the way later a judge agreed with him
that that was the case and dismissed charges

I'll tell you about that in a second but first
I want you to watch the video and again this

fairly horrific and there's going to be a
lot of damage done to him but noticed the

beginning when they start pounding on him
immediately watch this alright so the cops

see him they point the gun immediately he's
getting out of the car and go boom immediately

choke hold and he's and Dent's trying to get
out of the chokehold and then they punch him

in the head 16 times and they said he was
resisting arrest because he was putting his

hands up yeah that's because you were choking
him and punching him in the head look at the

state that he's in and if that wasn't enough
they used a stun gun on him three different

times in the legs and in the stomach 10 cops
showed up according to Dent's lawyer all 10

are white they pound the living crap out of
him immediately OK now let me tell you more

about the case after a judge saw the video
the charges of resisting arrest and assault

were immediately thrown out Den still faces
drug possession charges why cause they claim

that they found crack cocaine in the car hold
I'm going to tell you more about that in a

second first of all I saw the whole video
man the guy's driving in a perfectly nice

car they say oh well he was in an area where
there might be drugs he's near Detroit the

area might have drugs yes we understand that
it's the flimsiest excuse in the world they

turn on the sirens and he goes he goes for
another 5-10 seconds before he pulls over

trying to figure out what the hell's going
on and then you saw the video pick up right

there he stops he opens his door like hey
what's going on boom and they're on him cause

assume guilt instantly right look the judge
saw all the video and all the evidence and

immediately threw out the charges now we'll
get to the drugs right now he says Dent says

the bag of cocaine the officers claim they
found was planted and according to his attorney

there is unreleased video which shows the
officers planting the drugs the officer who

repeatedly punch Dent was charged by the U.S.
Attorney's evidence for planting evidence

and falsifying reports in 2003 no he's found
not guilty in that case but you might think

like really they're going to plant evidence
he was charged with this before he wouldn't

do it again would he what are you talking
about he got away with it he got caught that

one time gets away with it imagine how many
times he did it between now and 2003 how many

times he did it before 2003 so yeah I know
you got to convict him in court before you

can definitively that he did it but I would
be shocked that the guy who drags this guy

out for no reason and pounds the living hell
out of him who has been in the past accused

of planting crack cocaine apparently there's
video of him planting the cocaine in this

case you're going to be surprised to find
out that he planted cocaine but look they

didn't want to take any chances Dent goes
to the hospital immediately partly because

he's got to go to the hospital you see what
they did to him and he says hey can you please

test me for drugs cause he doesn't have any
drugs on him he didn't take any drugs they

made that part up and of course the tests
come through no drugs whatsoever in his system

now more excuse from the cops they say that
the officer who had dent in a chokehold says

that Dent bite him but he did not seek medical
attention or photograph his alleged injury

first off all he should have bitten him the
guy put him a choke hold what would you have

done to get out of the choke hold I don't
know what I would have done but I got I would

have had no problems trying to bite him to
get out of it right but second of all it appears

that also made up cause there's no pictures
believe me if the cop's got an actual injury

and they this immediately becomes a case they
would have taken picture after picture his

so-called injury look if you can judge for
yourself man the video is plain as day and

cops afterwards claimed oh he said he was
going to kill us you're the one with the guns

there's 10 of you one of him what the hell
are you talking about and you know they could

they have mics on them oh golly gee the mics
weren't working so we have no audio from saying

that we allege another wonderful coincidence
for the cops so this looks really bad it is

really bad it's yet another case in America
where cops go after an unarmed black guy viciously

now I'm glad there's these camera's now because
in the past African Americans would have said

it and a lot of people would have been like
oh sure sure sure why would the cops do that

oh I don't know where for no reason why would
the cops do that no the cops are here to protect

us they always treat me nice so they must
treat you nice it's probably your fault no

now you see the video this is what they've
been dealing for decades and Dent had it right

at the end he said look on the upside I'm
lucky to be living boy ain't that the truth

I mean these cases have become so common at
least our being aware of them has become common

because of the videos coming out now and you've
seen so many people who are unarmed being

shot that when you a horrific story like this
at the end you go at least he's still alive
that's the state of America right now

title: Police Assault Unarmed Black Man At Traffic Stop (Warning: Disturbing Content)
